name: Kist Pineapple Jam With Chilli
description: Pineapple Jam with Chilli, the first of its kind to be introduced to the Sri Lankan Market. This is produced with a rich harvest of local pineapple and chillies to satisfy the dual personality (sweet n spicy flavours) of our people. The delicious mix of pineapple and chillies mixed together is perfect to use as a marinade for meat items, for sandwiches, wraps and many more. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
